triples.name: Social network
triples.relevance: The paper studies evolutionary dynamics within social network structures.

triples.name: Public goods game
triples.relevance: The main game framework used to study cooperation evolution in networked groups.

triples.name: Evolutionary dynamics
triples.relevance: The primary mathematical framework for analyzing how cooperation evolves over time.

triples.name: Hypergraph
triples.relevance: Uniform hypergraphs are used to model higher-order interactions in the proposed framework.

triples.name: Replicator equation
triples.relevance: The paper establishes correspondence between the game on uniform hypergraphs and replicator dynamics.

triples.name: Cooperation (evolution)
triples.relevance: The paper studies the evolution of cooperation in higher-order network structures.

triples.name: Hub (network science)
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes how hubs (high-degree nodes) affect cooperation evolution.

triples.name: Game theory
triples.relevance: Foundational framework for analyzing strategic interactions in cooperation games.

triples.name: Evolutionary game theory
triples.relevance: The paper proposes applying evolutionary game theory to higher-order interactions in social networks.
